name: ChannelSurfer
0:
”Alexa, ask Channel Surfer to tune to channel 62”
”Alexa, ask Channel Surfer to find The Big Bang Theory”
”Alexa, ask Channel Surfer what am I watching”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: channel surfer
des:
Channel Surfer allows registered users to control their TV by using voice commands. Channel Surfer can change the TV channel and search for programs. Just say a command such as "Alexa, ask Channel Surfer to tune to channel 62".

Users will have to link their Amazon account to their TV service provider account. Note: check with your TV service provider to see if they are a Channel Surfer service provider.
